143.heading: Talking Someone Down.
143.title: "High Death!" 5 p. in He-Man, no. 2
143.author: [No author]
notes: (A True "He-Man" Adventure)

Summary: A circus aerialist is on a high bridge planning a suicide jump, and a policeman climbs up to talk her down. "You're young! You're pretty! You've got everything to live for!" Then another aerialist comes along and tries to kill them both.
